sentences.english: The shore diminishes 3 to 4 cm each year: it's hopeless, " says the scientist.
sentences.chinese: 海岸每年縮減3至4釐米，已經沒救了”。

sentences.english: I think that we have been not enough great , he has not saved therefore.
sentences.chinese: 我想我們不夠偉大，所以他沒救了。

sentences.english: Don't take on, and fret about it too much! it can't be helped.
sentences.chinese: 別難過，別爲這事太煩惱啦，沒救了。
那麼，媒體業是否就沒救了呢？

sentences.english: I can hear the paramedic say, This girl is going to die.
sentences.chinese: 我聽見醫生說，這個女孩沒救了。

sentences.english: You are helpless. Natural? You men are still only infatuated with the looks.
sentences.chinese: 真是沒救了。天然的？你們男人只癡迷於外表。

sentences.english: My turtle fell behind a radiator and was not discovered until too late.
sentences.chinese: 我的龜掉到一個散熱器的後面，發現時已經沒救了。

sentences.english: Many would have said this was a marriage without hope.
sentences.chinese: 許多人說，這段婚姻沒救了。

sentences.english: But that doesn't mean I'm not healed .
sentences.chinese: 但這並不意味着我沒救了。
